movies.title: Iron Man
movies.info: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

movies.title: Iron Man 2
movies.info: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.
movies.writers: Justin Theroux(screenplay) ,Stan Lee(Marvel comic book) ,Don Heck(Marvel comic book) ...
movies.stars: Robert Downey Jr. ,Mickey Rourke , Gwyneth Paltrow ...

movies.title: Iron Man 3
movies.info: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.
movies.writers: Drew Pearce(screenplay by) ,Shane Black(screenplay by) ,Stan Lee(based on the Marvel comic book by)

movies.title: Iron fist
movies.info: A young man is bestowed with incredible martial arts skills and a mystical force known as the Iron Fist.

movies.title: Iron sky
movies.info: The Nazis set up a secret base on the dark side of the moon in 1945 where they hide out and plan to return to power in 2018.
movies.writers: Jarmo Puskala(original concept) ,Johanna Sinisalo(based on a story by) ,Michael Kalesniko(screenplay by)

movies.title: The Man in the Iron Mask
movies.info: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother whom he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?
movies.writers: Alexandre Dumas(novels Vingt ans après and Le Vicomte de Bragelonne) ,Randall Wallace(screenplay)

movies.title: Batman
movies.info: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

movies.title: Batman Returns
movies.info: While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.

movies.title: Batman & Robin
movies.info: Batman and Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.

movies.title: Batman Begins
movies.info: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

movies.title: Batman: Death in the Family
movies.info: An anthology series of 5 DC showcase: Death in the Family, Sgt. Rock, Adam Strange, The Phantom Stranger and Death.
movies.writers: Jim Aparo(based on: Batman) ,Bob Brown(character created by: Talia al Ghul) ,Gerry Conway(character created by: Jason Todd)

movies.title: Batman v Superman
movies.info: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.
movies.writers: Chris TerrioDavid S. Goyer ,Bob Kane(Batman created by)
movies.stars: Ben Affleck Henry Cavill Amy Adams

movies.title: Superman
movies.info: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.
movies.writers: Jerry Siegel(character created by: Superman) ,Joe Shuster(character created by: Superman) ,Mario Puzo(story)

movies.title: Superman III
movies.info: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.,director
movies.writers: Jerry Siegel(character created by: Superman) ,Joe Shuster(character created by: Superman) ,David Newman(screenplay by)

movies.title: Superman Returns
movies.info: Superman returns to Earth after spending five years in space examining his homeworld Krypton. But he finds things have changed while he was gone, and he must once again prove himself important to the world.

movies.title: Batman v Superman
movies.info: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.
movies.writers: Chris TerrioDavid S. Goyer ,Bob Kane(Batman created by)
movies.stars: Ben Affleck Henry Cavill Amy Adams

movies.title: Superman/Batman: Apocalypse
movies.info: Batman discovers a mysterious teen-aged girl with super-human powers and a connection to Superman. When the girl comes to the attention of Darkseid, the evil overlord of Apokolips, events take a decidedly dangerous turn.
movies.writers: Bob Kane(character created by: Batman) ,Jerry Siegel(character created by: Superman) ,Joe Shuster(character created by: Superman)

movies.title: Man of Steel
movies.info: An alien child is evacuated from his dying world and sent to Earth to live among humans. His peace is threatened when other survivors of his home planet invade Earth.
movies.writers: David S. Goyer(screenplay) ,Christopher Nolan(story) ,Jerry Siegel(Superman created by)
